Summary: TalentXperience is an exclusive platform for NUS-ISS graduate program students seeking an exciting internship experience. It aims to connect students with companies offering internship projects and opportunities. The event will include insightful sharing sessions, on-site interviews, and networking opportunities with company representatives. The event will take place on October 27, 2023, at NUS-ISS and registration closes on October 19, 2023. Additionally, the NUS-ISS Learning Festival, with the theme "Empowering Careers, Turbocharging Professional Growth," will take place in October-November 2023. It will feature distinguished academics and thought leaders from diverse industries, covering topics such as Generative Al, technology in the Green Economy, and digital product trends
